autosolvate.multicomponent.MixtureBuilderÔÉÅ

class autosolvate.multicomponent.MixtureBuilder(folder='/home/fren5/AutoSolvate-update/AutoSolvate/docs/', cube_size=54, closeness=2.0, charge_method='bcc', prefix=None)[source]ÔÉÅ

Create amber parameter files for a single solute with mixed solvents

Use ‚Äòadd_solute‚Äô to add solute and ‚Äòadd_solvent‚Äô to add solvent.

Parameters:

  • folder (str, Optional, default: current working directory) ‚Äì working directory

  • cube_size (int, Optional, default: 54) ‚Äì size of solvent cube in angstroms

  • closeness (float, Optional, default: 2.0) ‚Äì Solute-solvent closeness setting, corresponding to the tolerance parameter in packmol in √Ö,

  • charge_method (str, Optional, default: ‚Äúbcc‚Äù) ‚Äì name of charge fitting method (bcc, resp)

  • prefix (str, Optional, default: None) ‚Äì prefix of the output file names. Default will be <solute_name>_<solvent_name_1>_‚Ä¶-<solvent_name_n>

__init__(folder='/home/fren5/AutoSolvate-update/AutoSolvate/docs/', cube_size=54, closeness=2.0, charge_method='bcc', prefix=None)[source]ÔÉÅ
